participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.
I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.
i have been married eight years.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
i am content with my life.

participant_2.background:
I began whittling and traveling the country in my car.
i live in the great white north.
if i can t order it on the internet , i don t need it.
I play the piano to help my siblings relax.
my family is very supportive of my skiing.

content.text: How do you like living in the great white north?
I love it! Its so peaceful and quiet. I love being able to go out and enjoy the nature without all of the hustle and bustle.
I bet! I wish I lived somewhere a bit more quiet. I live in a big city and it can be really overwhelming sometimes.
Yeah, I could see how that could be a lot to handle. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my dog, go for walks, and play games. I also like to go to the movies and read.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies! I like to whittle and travel the country in my car. I also play the piano to help my siblings relax.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to whittle. And traveling the country in your car sounds like an amazing experience.
It is! I've been to so many different places and met so many interesting people. And whittling is really easy to learn! You just need a piece of wood and a knife.
That's good to know! Maybe I'll give it a try sometime.
You should! It's really relaxing and it's a great way to spend time outdoors.
I think I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
